author: Abdinur
title: African launchpad
description: Africa has a high number of university graduates each year but lacks a pathway for those graduates to enter employment or start a business.
solution: Secure Foothold will deploy an African launchpad on the Cardano blockchain, the launchpad will kickstart a business idea for Africans
experience: I have experience of the African system and the difficulties faced by graduates who want to start a business in Africa.
